basicInfo.name: Asura
basicInfo.flavor: After the unification, Asura was trained in the imperial palace and now only follows her emperor's commands.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 100% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 120% of Magic Attack.

Skill 1.name: Spirit Blade
Skill 1.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 285% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
 - 100% chance to inflict Focus Target. [Duration: 4 Turn(s)]
 - 100% chance to inflict Defense Reduction. [Duration: 4 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Effect: Defense Reduction to 36%.
Transcend Lv.2 Effect
 - Increases Turns: Inflicts Focus Target duration becomes 5 turn(s).
Transcend Lv.6 Effect
 - Increases Turns: Inflicts Defense Reduction duration becomes 5 turn(s).

Skill 2.name: Spirits' Blessing
Skill 2.desc:
All Allies
 - Grants a Barrier equal to 85% of the caster's Magic Attack. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Effect: Barrier absorption becomes equal to 100% of Magic Attack.

Passive.name: Sagacious Vision
Passive.desc:
Self
 - Grants Weakness Hit Chance Boost. [Always Active]
 - Grants a Barrier equal to 115% of the caster's Magic Attack upon activating a skill 1 time(s). [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Effect: Weakness Hit Chance Boost to 80%.
 - Increases Effect: Barrier absorption becomes equal to 135% of Magic Attack.

transcendence.transcend_7: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_8: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_9: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_10: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_11: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_12: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.

profile.story: After the unification, Asura was trained in the imperial palace and now only follows her emperor's commands.

basicInfo.name: Asura
basicInfo.flavor: In the process of the emperor's unification, the religion's existence was discovered and everyone but Asura was slaughtered. She was saved by her genie.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 90% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 90% of Physical Attack.

Skill 1.name: Spirit Blade
Skill 1.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 255% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
 - 100% chance to inflict Focus Target. [Duration: 4 Turn(s)]
 - 100% chance to inflict Defense Reduction. [Duration: 4 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 255% of Physical Attack.

Skill 2.name: Spirits' Blessing
Skill 2.desc:
All Allies
 - Grants a Barrier equal to 75% of the caster's Magic Attack. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Effect: Barrier absorption becomes equal to 75% of Physical Attack.

Passive.name: Sagacious Vision
Passive.desc:
Self
 - Grants Weakness Hit Chance Boost. [Always Active]
 - Grants a Barrier equal to 105% of the caster's Magic Attack upon activating a skill 1 time(s). [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Effect: Weakness Hit Chance Boost to 60%.

profile.story: In the process of the emperor's unification, the religion's existence was discovered and everyone but Asura was slaughtered. She was saved by her genie.

basicInfo.name: Asura
basicInfo.flavor: In an ancient secret religious sect, the one who could tame their genie was called Asura, the Pupil of Wisdom.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 80% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 80% of Physical Attack.

 - 100% chance to inflict Defense Reduction. [Duration: 4 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 230% of Physical Attack.

All Allies
 - Grants a Barrier equal to 70% of the caster's Magic Attack. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Effect: Barrier absorption becomes equal to 70% of Physical Attack.

Passive.name: Sagacious Vision

Self
 - Grants Weakness Hit Chance Boost. [Always Active]
 - Grants a Barrier equal to 95% of the caster's Magic Attack upon activating a skill 1 time(s). [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
